description: two people sleeping on a pile of logs in foreground; four other figures in background; printed in brown and green
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Edition and Stamp

URC, in pencil: [301]; LLC, in pencil: [22756]; LRC, in pencil: various illegible inscriptions; on back, in pencil: [-2140-]
markings: LRQ, impressed in paper: [ED. SAGOT / Editeur / PARIS]; LRC at bottom edge, in pencil: [2e Etat]
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2007; sold in August for KTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2007-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepere]; along bottom edge, in pencil: [Le Lundi Doux Repos]
title: On Monday, Sweet Repose
